protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Plays a role in the inducible expression of cytokine genes in T-cells, especially in the induction of the IL-2 or IL-4 gene transcription. Also controls gene expression in embryonic cardiac cells. Could regulate not only the activation and proliferation but also the differentiation and programmed death of T-lymphocytes as well as lymphoid and non-lymphoid cells

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
